title: iPhone by deafult will send and receive bytes in Little Endian format, but my device MINEW witch chipset NRF51822 have ARM archteture and need bytes in Big Endian format, so I have to swap it.

inline_content.Text: iPhone by deafult will send and receive bytes in Little Endian format, but my device MINEW witch chipset NRF51822 have ARM archteture and need bytes in Big Endian format, so I have to swap it.

title: BLE Device documentation will say what type of input and output each characteristic will have and if you can read it like above (CBCharacteristicWriteType.withResponse).

inline_content.Text: BLE Device documentation will say what type of input and output each characteristic will have and if you can read it like above (CBCharacteristicWriteType.withResponse).

title: To update a gatt server information you have to reboot it programmatically or save data to it and turn off and turn on manually.

inline_content.Text: To update a gatt server information you have to reboot it programmatically or save data to it and turn off and turn on manually.

title: FFFF is characteristic that do it in this device.

inline_content.Text: FFFF is characteristic that do it in this device.

title: ‘minew123’ is the default password for reboot o save information in this case.

inline_content.Text: ‘minew123’ is the default password for reboot o save information in this case.

title: run your app and watch you console for any error, I hope none, but you will not see the new value yet.

inline_content.Text: run your app and watch you console for any error, I hope none, but you will not see the new value yet.

title: Last step is to comment last line in method didUpdateValueFor and rerun the app, now you will the new value.

inline_content.Text: Last step is to comment last line in method didUpdateValueFor and rerun the app, now you will the new value.
